name: Pong (itch) (Gonburden)
description:
Pong recreated in Unity.

This is a relatively simple recreation of the arcade game Pong. You are able to play in either two player or against an AI. The AI really isn't advanced in any way or form and will occasionally confidantly fail to hit the ball.

I used unitys built-in "graphics" (The plain squares and circles) for graphical assets, after all the graphics in pong are very simple.

The lovely UI text font was made by Style-7 
Link: https://www.1001fonts.com/digital-7-font.html

The left paddle is controlled with: W - up | S - down
The Right paddle is controlled with: Up Arrow - up | Down Arrow - down

Made for an assignment in university.
